# Probability mass vectors
X <- c(1/4, 1/2, 1/4, 0, 0)
Y <- c(1/2, 0, 1/2, 0, 0)
Z <- c(1/4, 0, 1/2, 0, 1/4)

# X + Y
S1 <- sapply(1:5,
             function(i){
               sum(X[1:i] * Y[i:1])
             })

S1

# S2 = X + Y + Z = S1 + Z
# needs to have a length of 9 since S2 = 0,1,..,8
Z <- c(Z, rep(0,4))
S1 <- c(S1, rep(0,4))

S1


S2 <- sapply(1:9,
             function(i){
               sum(S1[1:i] * Z[i:1])
             })

S2
